Uses of Interface
de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.WizardListener

  • Packages that use WizardListener 
    Package Description
    de.mrapp.android.preference.activity  

    • Uses of WizardListener in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity

      Methods in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity with parameters of type WizardListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PreferenceActivity.addWizardListener(WizardListener listener)
      Adds a new listener, which should be notified, when the user navigates within the activity, if it is used as a wizard, to the activity.
      void PreferenceActivity.removeWizardListener(WizardListener listener)
      Removes a specific listener, which should not be notified, when the user navigates within the activity, if it is used as a wizard, from the activity.
